subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Arizona State’s Jacquelyn Johnson set a collegiate record in the pentathlon, winning the event for the third consecutive year at the N.C.A.A. Indoor Track and Field Championships in Fayetteville, Ark. Johnson was in second place entering the 800 meters, the last of the five events that comprise the pentathlon. She outran the field by more than five seconds and finished with a record 4,496 points.
